comments.creator: mozilla@felixmoeller.de
comments.text: For the user it is important to know which events are moved to the server and which are just in locale cache. So it might be an idea to cut a small piece of a corner for unsynced events or have them in shaded slightly or show it in the tooltip for now.
comments.author: mozilla@felixmoeller.de
comments.raw_text: For the user it is important to know which events are moved to the server and which are just in locale cache. So it might be an idea to cut a small piece of a corner for unsynced events or have them in shaded slightly or show it in the tooltip for now.

comments.creator: unlogic@unlogic.se
comments.text: I agree, it would be great if unsynched events could be differentiated from synced events.
comments.author: unlogic@unlogic.se
comments.raw_text: I agree, it would be great if unsynched events could be differentiated from synced events.
